/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street is framed by large concrete arches, a testament to the architectural prowess of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees and buildings can be seen, further enhancing the depth and complexity of the image.
